name: SleepNoise
0:
”Alexa open sleep noise”
”Alexa ask sleep noise to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep noise
des:
Sleep Noise is a proven and effective way to block out distractions and fall asleep easy. Using a combination of natural ambient sound frequencies, sleep noise is the ultimate soothing companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Sleep Noise, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
